tool.name: SAGA.table_tools.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayAPPEND False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.table_tools.8 INPUT $INPUT APPEND $APPEND prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: APPEND
param.label: Append Rows from ...
param.help: Append Rows from ... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
